author: cms-sw
body:
backport of #9927 
This includes the following PRs backported to 15.0.X
- https://github.com/cms-data/RecoTracker-MkFit/pull/16
  -  Re-organize layer plan for pattern recognition in phase-2 tracker, for PS modules
- https://github.com/cms-data/RecoTracker-MkFit/pull/17
  - Additional config for mkFit HLT doublet recovery iteration
title: [15.0.X]  Update tag for RecoTracker-MkFit to V00-17-00
